death_train: Ah! There comes the vampire huntress.
Death itself stands in my way? If you do not let me pass, I shall strike you down like all other monsters!
...A ruthless genocide - I cannot allow that. Your powers will be removed.
Let's see if you have the courage to keep going. Farewell, Aggy Saintsworn.
save: Your game has been saved successfully!
health_up: Your max health has been increased by 5!
double_jump: Jump again in the air to activate a double jump.
spear: You found the fancy spear! Your whip will now emit magic spears.
